trigonometric: Ma ọ bụ metụtara ụkpụrụ nke trigonometry
ak\u1ee5k\u1ee5: Oghere dị n'etiti ahịrị abụọ ma ọ bụ ụgbọ elu na-agafe
n'ak\u1ee5k\u1ee5: Inwe oke ma ọ bụ ọnụ ọnụ
radian: Ngalaba akụkụ ụgbọ elu hà nhata n'akuku etiti okirikiri gbadatara site na aak hà nhata n'ogologo ya na radius.
mmehie: Oke nke ogologo akụkụ chere ihu n'akuku enyere na ogologo hypotenuse nke triangle nwere aka nri.
kosin: Oke akụkụ dị n'akụkụ na hypotenuse nke triangle nwere aka nri
tangent: Ahịrị na-emetụ akụkụ mgbanaka naanị otu ebe
nkeji: Ahịrị kwụ ọtọ nke na-agafe akụkụ n'akụkụ abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa
pythagorean theorem: Mmekọrịta dị mkpa na geometry Euclidean n'etiti akụkụ atọ nke triangle ziri ezi
\u1ecdr\u1ee5 oge: Ọrụ na-emegharị ụkpụrụ ya n'oge oge ma ọ bụ oge
njup\u1ee5ta: Ntugharị kachasị elu ma ọ bụ anya na-ebugharị site na isi ihe na ahụ ma ọ bụ ifegharị na-ama jijiji
ogo ogo: Ntụle nke akụkụ na ogo, ebe a na-ekewa okirikiri zuru oke na ogo 360
